Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.projects.settings

Class ProjectSettingsAssociatedProjectsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.projects.settings.ProjectSettingsAssociatedProjectsController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/settings/associated")
@Scope("session")
public class ProjectSettingsAssociatedProjectsController
extends Object
    Controller for handling associated projects in a project

      • getAssociatedProjectsPage

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=GET)
public String getAssociatedProjectsPage​(@PathVariable
                                        Long projectId,
                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                        Principal principal)
        Get the associated projects for the given project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project to get associated projects
        model - A model for the view
        principal - a reference to the logged in user.
        Returns:
        The view name of the associated projects view

      • ajaxAssociatedProjects

        @RequestMapping("/ajax/associated")
@ResponseBody
public List<Project> ajaxAssociatedProjects​(@PathVariable
                                            Long projectId)
        Get a list of the local associated projects.
        Parameters:
        projectId - Long identifier for the current Project
        Returns:
        a list of the associated projects for the given project

      • addAssociatedProject

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​String> addAssociatedProject​(@PathVariable
                                                     Long projectId,
                                                     @RequestParam
                                                     Long associatedProjectId,
                                                     Locale locale)
        Add an associated project to a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The subject project id
        associatedProjectId - The associated project id
        locale - Locale of the logged in user
        Returns:
        "success" if the request was successful

                                                        Long associatedProjectId,

      • editAssociatedProjectsForProject

        @RequestMapping("/edit")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasPermission(#projectId, \'isProjectOwner\')")
public String editAssociatedProjectsForProject​(@PathVariable
                                               Long projectId,
                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                               Principal principal)
        Get the edit associated projects page
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the current project
        model - Model object to be passed to the view
        principal - The logged in user
        Returns:
        The name of the edit associated projects view

      • getPotentialAssociatedProjects

        @RequestMapping("/ajax/available")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasPermission(#projectId, \'isProjectOwner\')")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​Object> getPotentialAssociatedProjects​(@PathVariable
                                                               Long projectId,
                                                               Principal principal,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               Integer page,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               Integer count,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               String sortedBy,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               String sortDir,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="name",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                               String projectName)
        Get Projects that could be associated with this project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The current project ID
        principal - The logged in user
        page - The page to request
        count - The number of elements in the page
        sortedBy - The property to sort by
        sortDir - The direction to sort in
        projectName - The project name to search for
        Returns:
        A Map<String,Object> of elements for a datatable

        Handle entity exists exceptions for creating RelatedProjectJoins
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception to handle.
        Returns:
